CatDescriptText: Broadside in window reads, "We Support the NAACP Boycott of Products from Quaker State Bottling Company, Don't Buy Coca - Cola, Sprite and Bottoms - up, Join the NAACP, Win the Fight For Fair Employment"  another broadside reads, "Pack 315 Homewood - Belmar, This is My Country 1963 Scout Show."
TitMainTitle: Belmar Dairy Store with broadsides for Boy Scouts and NAACP boycott in window, 1030 North Lang Avenue, Homewood
